questions.q1-question: Do you prefer a male or female character?
questions.q2-question: Are you willing to invest money and/or time in the character? (Subjective)
questions.q3-question: What would you think you'd enjoy the most?
questions.q4-question: How would you feel about having to target specifically the head/back for max damage?

answers.costly-prioritize: Strongly prefer a character that needs heavy investment
answers.costly-prefer: Prefer heavy investment, but it's ok if it doesn't
answers.frugal-prioritize: Strongly prefer characters that do not need much investment
answers.frugal-prefer: Prefer less investment, but don't mind spending a little
